content: materials - 3 skeins of purl soho s understory 1 50% baby alpaca 25% baby yak and 25% silk each skein is 250 yards/ 100 grams approximately 650 yards required we used the color ripe plum - us 10 6 mm straight or circular needles 3 gauge 28 stitches and 20 row = 4 inches in stitch pattern size finished dimensions 8 inches wide x 68 inches long 1 https //www purlsoho com/understory 2 https //www purlsoho com/yarn/knitting-crochet html yarn_stitches_per_inch_filter=970 3 https //www purlsoho com/tools/knitting-needles html
